name: Tabi Vs Matt
description:
After Gilfriend and Boyfriend meet Tabi, he will do everything possible to complete his revenge, but no one imagined that Matt would be there, so after destroying the whole place, Matt will arrive without imagining that Gilfriend and Boyfriend would be part of it. , but he will be so mad at Tabi for interrupting his Training, so Matt will take Boyfriend's place in the third song. 

You can play as Matt in the third song.
